short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TermsAi provides quick summaries of terms and agreements using AI. Understand key points effortlessly with a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 Navigate Terms with Confidence with TermsAi! 🔍

Join the savvy 3% of individuals who understand what they're agreeing to - effortlessly, with TermsAi. Our unique Chrome extension is designed to revolutionize the way you view Terms & Conditions. Instead of scrolling endlessly through jargon-filled documents, TermsAi provides concise, clear-cut summaries, giving you the key points and potential red flags like hidden fees or binding commitments.

💡 Why TermsAi? Discover the Undisclosed. 💡

TermsAi harnesses advanced AI technology to delve into the densest of terms, agreements, and privacy policies, shining a light on those tricky clauses and concealed charges that you might not notice. With just one click, our extension empowers you to make informed decisions about the services you sign up for, saving your time and safeguarding your rights.

🖱️ One Click Towards Transparent Transactions. 🖱️

Ready for a hassle-free browsing experience? Click the download button now and step into a world of transparent, understandable, and fair service agreements. With TermsAi, stay ahead and secure, knowing you're making the best-informed choices on the web. 🌐🔒

Here's how to make TermsAi your legal eagle in seconds:

🛠️ Set Up with Ease: Install the TermsAi extension from the Chrome Web Store.
📌 Always at Your Fingertips: Pin the extension on your browser toolbar for quick access.
🌐 Your Exploration Begins: Navigate to any website with Terms & Conditions you’d prefer in plain language.
📢 Summon Your Assistant: Click on the TermsAi extension icon.
🧭 Navigate Smartly: Select the 'Available Links' tab within the extension.
🧙‍♂️ Demystify Legalese: Hit 'Summarize Terms and Conditions.' The magic is in the making!
🔓 Knowledge Unlocked: After a brief loading period, your summaries are ready. One click and you’re now the master of the fine print!
